Trigger.Name: Water IV
Trigger.RegularExpression: Famfrit, the Darkening Cloud begins casting Water IV.

Trigger.Name: Puppet Aegis Aerial Support Surface Laser
Puppet Aegis Aerial Support Surface Laser
Puppet Heavy Active Laser Turret Initial
Puppet Heavy Active Laser Turret Move
Out -> In - Slash and Burn Lion first
In -> Out - Slash and Burn Lioness first
Markers out - Far Above, Deep Below Blue
In - Heat Above, Flames Below Blue
Out - Heat Above, Flames Below Orange
Out and stack - Hearth Above, Flight Below Orange

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Go out and stack, ignore chase marks

Trigger.Name: Stack - Far Above, Deep Below Orange
In -> Out - Hearth Above, Flight Below Blue

Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Go in, then markers out, ignore stack
